tasks.title: Branch cherry-picks: Tier 1 backend fixes
tasks.description: DEPRECATED — all claude/* branches deleted 2026-02-25. Useful branches (remote-control-elb2r, recursive-self-improvement-HOGR1) merged to master. Stale branches (audit-launch-readiness, or-this-vision-strategy, resume-website-planning, startup-viral-growth-research) deleted — code already captured on master.

tasks.title: Branch cherry-picks: Tier 2 backend (manual extract)
tasks.description: DEPRECATED — source branches deleted 2026-02-25. Code was already captured on master prior to deletion.

tasks.title: Pinch-to-zoom crop tool
tasks.description: ImageCropPreview.tsx — full pinch/pan gesture handler using react-native-gesture-handler + reanimated. EXIF-normalized URI via manipulateAsync no-op pass. 3:4 crop frame with dim masks. camera.tsx uses it in preview mode.

tasks.title: AI feedback: Vogue voice + v3.0 format
tasks.description: ai-feedback.service.ts: PROMPT_VERSION='v3.2', full Vogue editorial system prompt with style lanes + styling moves + 5 example analyses. JSON schema: overallScore, whatsRight[], couldImprove[], takeItFurther[], editorialSummary, styleDNA.

tasks.title: Frontend: feedback display v3.0
tasks.description: feedback.tsx: full-bleed hero image, score overlay, bullet rows (+/–/↑), editorial pull-quote block, FeedbackCard sections. feedbackAdapter.ts handles v3.0 and v1/v2 legacy formats via normalizeFeedback().

tasks.title: [YC T1] Launch beta to 20-50 users
tasks.description: Distribute via TestFlight (iOS) + direct APK to modeling network + Reddit fashion/style communities. Need real usage data before submitting YC application.

tasks.title: [YC T1] Record 1-minute product demo video
tasks.description: Screen recording of full flow: camera → context input → AI feedback → score card. Upload to unlisted YouTube or Vimeo for application link.

tasks.title: [YC T1] Verify/initiate Delaware C-Corp incorporation
tasks.description: YC expects a Delaware C-Corp or willingness to convert. Use Stripe Atlas, Clerky, or a lawyer. Confirm current legal entity status first.

tasks.title: [YC T1] Check waitlist signup count
tasks.description: Pull current count from orthis.app / any existing waitlist. Add exact number to YC application if >0. Even 50 signups signals demand.

tasks.title: [YC T2] Write 25+ interview Q&A document
tasks.description: Prepare and practice answers for the most common YC interview questions. Each answer must be deliverable in under 30 seconds. Practice out loud until fluent.

tasks.title: [YC T2] Build monthly cohort financial model
tasks.description: Spreadsheet showing 0 → $1M ARR progression. Include assumptions: conversion rate, ARPU, churn, CAC. Must be defensible in the room.

tasks.title: [YC T2] Prepare 'zero users' answer with beta data
tasks.description: YC will ask about traction. Have a crisp, honest answer ready: what you've done, what you've learned from beta, and why you believe in the product despite early stage.

tasks.title: [YC T2] Create side-by-side comparison: Or This? vs ChatGPT
tasks.description: Take the same outfit photo. Run it through ChatGPT and Or This?. Document the difference in specificity, personalization, and actionability. Use in interviews and pitch.

tasks.title: [YC T3] Submit iOS build to App Store
tasks.description: Current build already delivered. Submit for App Store review. A live App Store listing significantly strengthens the application.

tasks.title: [YC T3] Submit Android AAB to Google Play
tasks.description: Build the Android AAB and submit to Google Play for review. Dual-platform presence demonstrates scale ambition.

tasks.title: [YC T3] Get orthis.app landing page live
tasks.description: Deploy the landing page and start collecting waitlist signups. Even a few hundred signups before application deadline is meaningful signal.

tasks.title: [YC T3] Collect 3-5 user testimonial quotes from beta
tasks.description: Ask beta users for honest feedback quotes. Even informal DMs work. Specific praise ('it told me my blazer was too formal for a first date') is more powerful than general.
